This past week we celebrated the opening of our Bronx Community School building, which is now the home of Children's Aid College Prep Charter School and a new Children’s Aid community center that solidifies our 20-year partnership with the South Bronx community. The state-of-the-art building features spacious hallways, a basketball gymnasium, an expanded science room, art room, dedicated dance studio, music room, and more. “It’s the promise of designing and delivering a school and a program equal to the dreams and aspirations of our families and scholars,” Casey Vier, principal of CACPCS said. Read more: bit.ly/2ng4aWh
